name: Gary Eley Design
description: I'm Gary, a Graphic designer & Art Director from Bristol who currently resides in the East Midlands. I have spent the past 7+ years working in agencies, across the East Midlands and Birmingham, who specialise in multiple sectors and disciplines such as; Branding, packaging, editorial, digital, FMCG, food & beverage, small businesses & start-ups along with well established international brands.
